gradeComment.A: Scale and relative propotions of objects in submission are in line with expectations. Little to no deviation from reference.
gradeComment.C: Scale and relative proportion of objects in submission close to expectation. Mild or few discrepancies from reference present.
gradeComment.F: Scale and relative proportion of objects in submission not in line with expectation. Dramatic or numerous deviations from reference.

defaults.incomplete: Project does not meet minimum project requirements in order to be complete. Please review project requirements and meet with an instructor for further information.
